CustomField.description: This field has the Conga parameters for generating the MA Addendum
CustomField.formula: "&id=" + Id + "&templateid=" + "[CS Agreement Addendum]" + Product__r.Addendum_Template_Id__c + IF(ISBLANK(Product__r.Disclosure_Template_Countersigned__c),"",",[Disclosure Form]" + Product__r.Disclosure_Template_Countersigned__c) + "&qvar0id=a275b000002b7SQAAY?pv0=" + Id + "&queryid=[Opp]a270a0000020q0sAAA?pv1={QVar0},[UAS]a270a0000020q0vAAA?pv1={QVar0},[Percent]a275b000002b4gkAAA?pv1={QVar0},[kWDC]a275b000002b4gpAAA?pv1={QVar0},[Parent]a275b000002b4guAAA?pv2=" + Id + "&sc1=SalesforceFile" + "&defaultpdf=1" + "&sc0=1" + "&apdf=0" + "&UF0=1" + "&qmode=SalesforceFile" + "&MFTS0=Generate_Addendum__c" + "&MFTSValue0=false" + "&MFTS1=CompanySignedDate" + "&MFTSValue1=" + TEXT(TODAY()) + "&ContentWorkspaceId=0585b000000aDRHAA2" + "&ContentCustomFieldName=Signing_Status__c" + "&ContentCustomFieldValue=Countersigned"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field has the Conga parameters for generating the MA Addendum
CustomField.label: Conga Addendum
